name: Flex
description: Flex 布局容器，用于设置子元素的布局方式。
description_zh: Flex 布局容器，用于设置子元素的布局方式。

vertical.description: Whether the flex direction is vertical, using flex-direction: column
vertical.description_zh: flex 主轴的方向是否垂直，使用 flex-direction: column

wrap.description: Set whether the element is displayed in a single line or in multiple lines
wrap.description_zh: 设置元素单行显示还是多行显示

justify.type: normal / flex-start / flex-end / center / space-between / space-around / space-evenly / stretch / start / end / baseline
justify.description: Set the alignment of elements in the main axis direction
justify.description_zh: 设置元素在主轴方向上的对齐方式

align.type: normal / flex-start / flex-end / center / space-between / space-around / stretch / baseline / start / end
align.description: Set the alignment of elements in the cross axis direction
align.description_zh: 设置元素在交叉轴方向上的对齐方式

:gap.description: Set the gap between grid items

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

flex-wrap.name: nowrap
flex-wrap.description: All flex items will be on one line
flex-wrap.description_zh: 所有 flex 项目都将在一行

flex-wrap.name: wrap
flex-wrap.description: Flex items will wrap onto multiple lines, from top to bottom
flex-wrap.description_zh: flex 项目将在必要时换行，从上到下

flex-wrap.name: wrap-reverse
flex-wrap.description: Flex items will wrap onto multiple lines from bottom to top
flex-wrap.description_zh: flex 项目将在必要时换行，从下到上

justify-content.name: normal
justify-content.description: Default value, items are packed in their default position
justify-content.description_zh: 默认值，项目按默认位置排列

justify-content.name: flex-start
justify-content.description: Items are packed toward the start of the flex-direction

justify-content.name: flex-end
justify-content.description: Items are packed toward the end of the flex-direction

justify-content.name: center
justify-content.description: Items are centered along the line

justify-content.name: space-between
justify-content.description: Items are evenly distributed; first item at the start, last item at the end
justify-content.description_zh: 项目位于各行之间留有空白的容器内

justify-content.name: space-around
justify-content.description: Items are evenly distributed with equal space around each item
justify-content.description_zh: 项目位于各行之前、之间、之后都留有空白的容器内

justify-content.name: space-evenly
justify-content.description: Items are distributed so that the spacing between any two items is equal
justify-content.description_zh: 项目分布使任何两个项目之间的空间相等

align-items.name: normal
align-items.description: Default value, items are stretched to fit the container
align-items.description_zh: 默认值，项目被拉伸以适应容器

align-items.name: flex-start
align-items.description: Items are placed at the start of the cross axis
align-items.description_zh: 项目位于容器的交叉轴开头

align-items.name: flex-end
align-items.description: Items are placed at the end of the cross axis
align-items.description_zh: 项目位于容器的交叉轴结尾

align-items.name: center
align-items.description: Items are centered along the cross axis

align-items.name: baseline
align-items.description: Items are aligned such as their baselines align
align-items.description_zh: 项目的第一行文字的基线对齐

align-items.name: stretch
align-items.description: Items are stretched to fit the container
align-items.description_zh: 项目被拉伸以适应容器
